fields.summary: MobileWeb: TabGroup - Closing the window of a open window inside a tab group causes the tab at the last index to become the active tab

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Steps To Reproduce:
1. Launch KS from device pointing to localhost
2. When KS is loaded click on Slider

Actual:
No indication that the row was clicked and takes ~2 second before content loads

Expected:
To either indicate it was clicked and loading or load faster
fields.summary: MobileWeb: Table View : Clicking on the table view row takes ~2 seconds before the content load, no indication that the row is clicked or will respond
fields.environment:
SDK: 2.0.0.v20120305174654
Android: Samsung Galaxy 4.0.2
iOS: iPhone 4 (5.0.1)

comments.body: The root cause of this problem is the same as TIMOB-8059 (amazingly enough).
Tested with 2.0.0.v20120322231759, still too slow being that there is no indication that it has been clicked
We are bundling all performance related items under TIMOB-8355.
